api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: Zenloop API Token. See here on how to obtain API Token.

date_from.title: Start Date
date_from.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

survey_id.title: Survey ID
survey_id.description: Zenloop Survey ID. Can be found here. Leave empty to pull answers from all surveys

survey_group_id.title: Survey Group ID
survey_group_id.description: Zenloop Survey Group ID. Leave empty to pull answers from all survey groups
